Package edu.stanford.nlp.international.arabic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArabicMorphoFeatureSpecification
    Extracts morphosyntactic features from BAMA/SAMA analyses.
    ArabicMorphoFeatureSpecification.ArabicMorphoFeatures
    Converts features specifications to labels for tagging
    Buckwalter
    This class can convert between Unicode and Buckwalter encodings of Arabic.
    IBMArabicEscaper
    This escaper is intended for use on flat input to be parsed by LexicalizedParser.
